pages.text: $(li)Sap Bottles is a item that can be used to craft Sugar and Sappy Maple Log in a Crafting Table.$(br)$(li)You can make Syrup Bottle Smelting a Sap Bottle in a Furnace, Smoking, or Campfire.

$(li)To obtain a Sap Bottle, first you need to right click multiple Maple Log while you are holding any kind of Axe on your hand. You have a little probability that a Sappy Mapple Log appears.$(br)$(li)Finally right click the Sappy Mapple Log while you are holding a Glass Bottle on your hand to obtain a Sap Bottle.
